copirait: @2024 Developed by Qsoft Development Team ❤️ for Polaris Web3 ✩

suscription.incorrect: Incorrect email, be sure to spell it correctly.
suscription.correct: Email correct and ready to be sent.

section1.title: Access to Information Easy, Fast and Convenient
section1.subtitle: Polaris is an open source utility ecosystem developed to facilitate decision making on the Blockchain.

section3.title: Bringing Web 3 to the click of a button
section3.subtitle: An all-in-one open source platform so you can make decisions with the best information on your side.

card.title: Top cryptocurrencies statistics in *real time
card.description: Discover the real prices of the most interesting cryptocurrencies in the sector and how to get the best possible return. (BETA)

card1.title: Analysis of the most *impactful Web3 projects
card1.description: See what news can really have a positive or negative impact on the market and make informed decisions. (BETA)

card2.title: Most *recommended Web3 projects in the industry
card2.description: Find and research NFT projects that really have an innovative product or an interesting value proposition. (ALPHA)

card3.title: Choose different themes to *change the Blockchain
card3.description: With the Polaris Extension you can choose between different themes to make the Blockchain readable and perform traces. (ALPHA)

card4.title: Deep *tracking kit for research on the Blockchain
card4.description: Polaris kit, is a set of tools created to perform deep traces on any Blockchain using Artificial Intelligence. (PREALPHA)

card5.title: Win in video games and earn *rewards
card5.description: Polaris will have a series of interactive games for DeskTop, Web and through which our customers will get rewards. (PREALPHA).

section4.title: Polaris Documentation
section4.subtitle: A complete, detailed and open source documentation. In it you can find all the specifications of the project.
